# ::snt ****pls read & share*** U S NAVAL COMMAND. WHAT IS GOING ON HERE? TOO MANY CRASHES...SOMEONE HAS TO ANSWER. PRAYERS TO OUR SAILORS.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (r / read-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (m2 / military
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "U"
                              :op2 "S"
                              :op3 "Navy"
                              :op4 "Committee")))
            :op2 (s / share-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 m2))
      :snt2 a
      :op1 (g / go-on-15
            :ARG1 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :location (h / here))
      :op2 (c / casualty
            :quant (m3 / many
                  :degree (t / too)))
      :snt3 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (e / everyone)
            :ARG2 (a3 / ANSWER-01
                  :ARG0 e))
      :snt4 (p / pray-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :beneficiary (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (s2 / serve-01
                        :ARG1 w2))))
